title: ASUS Celeron Dual Core - (4 GB/1 TB HDD/Windows 10 Home) X543MA-GQ1015T Laptop  (15.6 inch, Transparent Silver, 1.9 kg)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 1.1 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 2.8 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 1 x USB 3.2 (1st Gen) Type A, 2 x USB 2.0 Type A
product_specification.Screen Type: HD LED Backlit Anti-glare Display (200 nits Brightness, 45% NTSC, 75% Screen-to-body Ratio)
product_specification.Additional Features: 33 WHr Li-ion Battery, BIOS Booting User Password Protection

product_description.Aesthetic Design: This ASUS laptop features a sturdy design and weighs just 1.9 kg, making it perfect to take it along with you when you’re going to the office or on a vacation. The stylish design of this laptop is sure to grab the attention of onlookers.
product_description.Powerful Processor: Powered by an Intel Celeron Dual Core N4020 processor and 4GB of LPDDR4 RAM, this laptop can seamlessly handle your daily computing tasks.
product_description.Large Storage Space: Equipped with a 1 TB HDD, this laptop from ASUS lets you store all your important documents, pictures, videos, movies, music albums, video games, and more in a single place.
product_description.Easy Connectivity: This ASUS laptop comes with a USB 3.2 Type-A (Gen 1) port so that you can connect compatible devices to it and experience fast data transfer speeds. The two standard USB 2.0 Type-A ports are compatible with all USB devices, such as hard drives, pen drives, and more. To top it off, this laptop also has an HDMI output port and a microSD card reader.
product_description.ASUS SonicMaster and ASUS Audio Wizard: The ASUS SonicMaster and ASUS Audio Wizard offer an amazing combination of hardware, software, and audio tuning so that you can experience rich and high-fidelity audio at all times, irrespective of whether you’re playing games or watching movies. The ASUS SonicMaster uses a professional-grade codec which encodes and decodes audio while also making use of large speakers, amplifiers, and resonance chambers to deliver rich and clear audio. The ASUS Audio Wizard software suite helps achieve the perfect audio balance for any type of sonic content. You can adjust the audio according to your preference, thanks to the manual settings options.
product_description.High-fidelity Audio: The speakers of this laptop utilize the available chassis space so that they can deliver enhanced low-frequency audio performance with reduced noise. The extra-large 19.4cc chamber delivers a clear and powerful audio output with rich and deep bass, taking your audio experience to the next level.
product_description.Rich and Clear Visuals: With the ASUS Splendid technology, every content that you watch on this laptop’s screen will be rich and immersive. This technology has four display modes, namely Normal mode, Vivid mode, Eye Care mode, and Manual mode. The Normal mode is perfect for everyday computing tasks. The Vivid mode helps optimize the contrast so that your photos and videos will appear stunning. The Eye Care mode helps reduce blue-light levels, thereby minimizing eye strain. The Manual mode helps you adjust the color according to your preference. You can enjoy enhanced image quality as the ASUS Tru2Life Video technology helps in intelligently optimizing each pixel in the video frame.
product_description.Ergonomic Keyboard: If you have to type multiple pages for your report or send out a huge email, you don’t have to worry about finger fatigue as the full-size one-piece chiclet keyboard of this laptop makes typing a breeze. It offers a 1.8 mm of key travel and minimal key float for a tactile typing experience.
product_description.Stays Cool for Long: Whether you’re playing games for long hours or binge-watching your favorite TV series, the ASUS IceCool technology tackles the heating issue by preventing the build-up of heat under the palm rest. This technology helps maintain the temperature of the palm rest surface in the range of 28°C to 35°C. The internal layout is designed in such a way that the heat-producing components are situated away from you. Moreover, the cooling from the heat pipes and vents also help keep this laptop cool.

review: It's very good to this price.....I really thankful to flipkart 😊😘.... it's very good experience with flipkart.... thank you...💙

I am happy with this laptop. Good for basic use at home. Good for kid's use also. Battery is good - runs more than 4-5 hours. Not happy with Display and no caps lock and number log indicator light.

I have just received the laptop today and am very excited to use it.Must say that at this price range it's one of the best laptops to buy without thinking once.Must buy if you want a decent work laptop with good specifications at this price range.

Its my review after used after 5 months.
Its not a valuable laptop for study or any smooth working purposes.
Issues:
1. Connectivity issues I m facing now. Specially usb port.
2. Battary performance was well for first 3 months. After it drains quickly without any playing video or audio. Only pdf reading it running hardly 2 hrs.
3. web camera is very bad performing like 0.3mp.
4. The processor also very slow and sometimes its hanging that one can't move for other work.
5. In sunlight one can't see the display correctly.
Conclusion: I don't recommend to purchase asus laptop. Go to any other companies.

If the person who wants for storage and only for audio or first learner then he or she can go for purchase it. It will be good.

it's quite good ,and one important thing to do while updating win 10 or download win 10 don't turn up your laptop it's quite risky when you download your update quickly install and restart it

a god product for students, i'm writing this review after use of 1 month, if you use it only for online class and watching you tube then it's best for you & also its consumes less data if you setting in metered connection. so don't worry about data consumption.

pros- good battery back up & charging very fast, clear resolution screen and it's comes with a classy look

cons- a little bit slower, * It's takes 30-40 sec to open and after open it takes 3-5 sec to being ready to use and the refresh process.

# you can't run smoothly video/photo editing software on this.

It is worth laptop who like to prefer to attending online classes, watching movies, simple ms office works. It built quality was good and key board was average it is 180 degree screen rotation.when to talk about performance we can tell average and we unable to run multi apps at a time and it takes long time to restart when laptop is updated and it has average camera quality and when compare to other laptops it not have LAN support and main drawback was we don’t know if caps lock is on or off (no light indication). Over all at this price it is worth to buy it has 1 year warranty but after few days we get notification of extension of warranty for another 1 year it is good to have total 2 years warranty for this laptop.

Writing this review after full 24 hours of putting this machine to grind. I bought this with a certain kind of apprehension, wondering the budget I had, the choice made after thorough research and the product chosen would cater to my needs or not? However, this piece of beauty is well equipped to go smoothly with my expectations of a big clear display, clear voice and word/pdf typing/reading works. A word of caution to the gamers though.. pros.Aesthetic Design: The laptop features a sturdy design and is perfect to carry along. It is lightweight and weighs only 1.9 kg.
pros.Price: Good laptop at such low price.

cons.33 WHr Li-ion Battery: Battery backup is below par. Could have better.
cons.Performance: The Intel Celeron Dual Core N4020 processor is slow and performs below average.

summary.verdict: The ASUS Celeron Dual Core is a budget laptop good for only normal use.
summary.Additional Information: Takes one hour to get fully charged, i3 processor.
